subject: Steve's Box #3----Youtube video
author: Urkel23
full_text:
Finally got it back together. What's funny is that this radio sucked big time until i brought it outside and started recording the video......weird????

It's not so bad now, but i'm averaging 1 box built per week now and it's taking up all of my time. Did i mention that i peaked at Box #1, the rest have been downhill. Here's the video of the new box, let me know what you guys think of it:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wXYkOOtE_vI

-Steve H.
